page.title: 02Mr Marchant the Pig Farmer.
page.content: {Mr Marchant }has been a pig farmer for 10 years. After studying at college for two years he spent two years as a pig man, about 7 years in pig farm management and in 1984 bought his own farm. He has 21 acres of land,17 acres of which he crops (Winter Wheat). He has about{750 Pigs}altogether, about 110 being{Breeding sows}and{5 Boars.} About{2,600 piglets }are born each year. They are sold after about 10 weeks. The pig food comes from a mill in Oxford. It is mostly Wheat and Barley and Bean meal,Fish meal which has plenty of protein, and Milk extract for the young ones. The hardest part of Mr. Marchant's job is getting the {sows}to farrow at the right time, he has not the room to cope with too many piglets. He starts work around 7:30am and finishes his day about 7:30pm.
